# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ParallelCoordinates)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ParallelCoordinatesPluginInfo.C
ParallelCoordinatesCommonPluginInfo.C
ParallelCoordinatesAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
ParallelCoordinatesPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
ParallelCoordinatesGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisParallelCoordinatesPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
QvisParallelCoordinatesWidget.C
QvisParallelCoordinatesPlotWizard.C
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisParallelCoordinatesPlotWindow.h
QvisParallelCoordinatesWidget.h
QvisParallelCoordinatesPlotWizard.h
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(GParallelCoordinatesPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
ParallelCoordinatesViewerPluginInfo.C
avtParallelCoordinatesPlot.C
avtParallelCoordinatesFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ParallelCoordinatesEnginePluginInfo.C
avtParallelCoordinatesPlot.C
avtParallelCoordinatesFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy 
)

SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/plots)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MESA_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(IParallelCoordinatesPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IParallelCoordinatesPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IParallelCoordinatesPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GParallelCoordinatesPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GParallelCoordinatesPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VParallelCoordinatesPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VParallelCoordinatesPlot visitcommon viewer )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GParallelCoordinatesPlot VParallelCoordinatesPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            ParallelCoordinatesScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyParallelCoordinatesAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SParallelCoordinatesPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SParallelCoordinatesPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SParallelCoordinatesPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaParallelCoordinates ALL ${CMAKE_Java_COMPILER} ${CMAKE_Java_FLAGS} -d ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java -classpath ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java ParallelCoordinatesAttributes.java)
        ADD_DEPENDENCIES(JavaParallelCoordinates JavaClient)
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EParallelCoordinatesPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EParallelCoordinatesPlot_ser visitcommon avtplotter_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EParallelCoordinatesPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EParallelCoordinatesPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EParallelCoordinatesPlot_par visitcommon avtplotter_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EParallelCoordinatesPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
